resources.string: Recovery Email sent successfully. Please check your Inbox to reset your password.
Enter the amount of money to Deposit.
is been deducted from your wallet. It will take up to 48 hours to transfer into your paypal address.

Please read the match, game and PlayersNest chosen rule before starting the match. Confirm if you are ready to play. If you\'re not confirmed within the 10 min period, the match will be cancelled and you\'re money will be refunded back.
Match will be cancelled in next 10 minutes if you\'re not ready to play.
The Match has been cancelled. Your money is refunded. Please search other matches.
Going back will cancel the match and you can\'t again play this match.
has requested to join the match.
You failed to join the match.
Kindly submit the correct scores to avoid being banned and fined from the players nest.
The Host has rejected your match request. Please check other matches to play.
Are you sure this is the correct score?
Your match will be deleted. Money will be refunded within few minutes.
Confirm create match? Entry Amount will get deducted from your wallet.
Confirm Join? Entry Amount will get deducted from your wallet.
You can\'t enter a live ongoing match. The match has started. Please search for other matches.
%s has Submitted the score. Please Submit your score before the timer ends.
Waiting for %s to approve the score…
This score will get submitted. And the result will be based on this score.
WRONG SCORES! Confirm enter a match dispute between your opponent?
YAY! you won the match. Winning amount will be transferred to your wallet within few moments.
You lost the match. Better luck next Time. Try other available matches to make a comeback.
You have entered in a match dispute. Submit your evidence to the admin to approve.
You have enter in a match dispute with %s. Please submit your score evidence.
Match evidence successfully submitted. Please wait for Admin approval.
%s has requested to join your created match.
%s has submitted the score. Please approve the scores.
\"Confirm send request? Entry amount will be deducted from your wallet. If the user didn\'t accept your match request within the next 24 hours, you\'re money will be refunded. \"
%s has sent you a match request.
Evidence successfully submitted. Please wait for approval by the admin.
Confirm cancel match request?. You\'re money will be refunded immediately.
%s has sent you a match request.
Dispute is approved by admin. Please enter chat.
No files are submitted. Submit files to continue.
